00042 /*
00043  * This implementation was written based on information provided by the
00044  * following documents:
00045  *
00046  * NFC Forum Type 3 Tag Operation Specification
00047  *  Technical Specification
00048  *  NFCForum-TS-Type-3-Tag_1.1 - 2011-06-28
00049  */
00050 
00051 #ifdef HAVE_CONFIG_H
00052 #  include "config.h"
00053 #endif // HAVE_CONFIG_H
00054 
00055 #include <errno.h>
00056 #include <signal.h>
00057 #include <stdlib.h>
00058 #include <unistd.h>
00059 
00060 #include <nfc/nfc.h>
00061 
00062 #include "nfc-utils.h"
00063 
00064 #if defined(WIN32) && defined(__GNUC__) /* mingw compiler */
00065 #include <getopt.h>
00066 #endif
00067 
00068 static nfc_device *pnd;
00069 static nfc_context *context;
00070 
00071 static void
00072 print_usage(char *progname)
00073 {
00074   fprintf(stderr, "usage: %s -o FILE\n", progname);
00075   fprintf(stderr, "\nOptions:\n");
00076   fprintf(stderr, "  -o     Extract NDEF message if available in FILE\n");
00077 }
00078 
00079 static void stop_select(int sig)
00080 {
00081   (void) sig;
00082   if (pnd != NULL) {
00083     nfc_abort_command(pnd);
00084   } else {
00085     nfc_exit(context);
00086     exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
00087   }
00088 }
00089 
00090 static void
00091 build_felica_frame(const nfc_felica_info nfi, const uint8_t command, const uint8_t *payload, const size_t payload_len, uint8_t *frame, size_t *frame_len)
00092 {
00093   frame[0] = 1 + 1 + 8 + payload_len;
00094   *frame_len = frame[0];
00095   frame[1] = command;
00096   memcpy(frame + 2, nfi.abtId, 8);
00097   memcpy(frame + 10, payload, payload_len);
00098 }
00099 
00100 #define CHECK     0x06
00101 static int
00102 nfc_forum_tag_type3_check(nfc_device *dev, const nfc_target nt, const uint16_t block, const uint8_t block_count, uint8_t *data, size_t *data_len)
00103 {
00104   uint8_t payload[1024] = {
00105     1, // Services
00106     0x0B, 0x00, // NFC Forum Tag Type 3's Service code
00107     block_count,
00108     0x80, block, // block 0
00109   };
00110 
00111   size_t payload_len = 1 + 2 + 1;
00112   for (uint8_t b = 0; b < block_count; b++) {
00113     if (block < 0x100) {
00114       payload[payload_len++] = 0x80;
00115       payload[payload_len++] = block + b;
00116     } else {
00117       payload[payload_len++] = 0x00;
00118       payload[payload_len++] = (block + b) >> 8;
00119       payload[payload_len++] = (block + b) & 0xff;
00120     }
00121   }
00122 
00123   uint8_t frame[1024];
00124   size_t frame_len = sizeof(frame);
00125   build_felica_frame(nt.nti.nfi, CHECK, payload, payload_len, frame, &frame_len);
00126 
00127   uint8_t rx[1024];
00128   int res;
00129   if ((res = nfc_initiator_transceive_bytes(dev, frame, frame_len, rx, sizeof(rx), 0)) < 0) {
00130     return res;
00131   }
00132   const int res_overhead = 1 + 1 + 8 + 2;  // 1+1+8+2: LEN + CMD + NFCID2 + STATUS
00133   if (res < res_overhead) {
00134     // Not enough data
00135     return -1;
00136   }
00137   uint8_t felica_res_len = rx[0];
00138   if (res != felica_res_len) {
00139     // Error while receiving felica frame
00140     return -1;
00141   }
00142   if ((CHECK + 1) != rx[1]) {
00143     // Command return does not match
00144     return -1;
00145   }
00146   if (0 != memcmp(&rx[2], nt.nti.nfi.abtId, 8)) {
00147     // NFCID2 does not match
00148     return -1;
00149   }
00150   const uint8_t status_flag1 = rx[10];
00151   const uint8_t status_flag2 = rx[11];
00152   if ((status_flag1) || (status_flag2)) {
00153     // Felica card's error
00154     fprintf(stderr, "Status bytes: %02x, %02x\n", status_flag1, status_flag2);
00155     return -1;
00156   }
00157   // const uint8_t res_block_count = res[12];
00158   *data_len = res - res_overhead + 1; // +1 => block count is stored on 1 byte
00159   memcpy(data, &rx[res_overhead + 1], *data_len);
00160   return *data_len;
00161 }
00162 
00163 int
00164 main(int argc, char *argv[])
00165 {
00166   (void)argc;
00167   (void)argv;
00168 
00169   int ch;
00170   char *ndef_output = NULL;
00171   while ((ch = getopt(argc, argv, "ho:")) != -1) {
00172     switch (ch) {
00173       case 'h':
00174         print_usage(argv[0]);
00175         exit(EXIT_SUCCESS);
00176         break;
00177       case 'o':
00178         ndef_output = optarg;
00179         break;
00180       case '?':
00181         if (optopt == 'o')
00182           fprintf(stderr, "Option -%c requires an argument.\n", optopt);
00183       default:
00184         print_usage(argv[0]);
00185         exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
00186     }
00187   }
00188 
00189   if (ndef_output == NULL) {
00190     print_usage(argv[0]);
00191     exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
00192   }
00193   FILE *message_stream = NULL;
00194   FILE *ndef_stream = NULL;
00195 
00196   if ((strlen(ndef_output) == 1) && (ndef_output[0] == '-')) {
00197     message_stream = stderr;
00198     ndef_stream = stdout;
00199   } else {
00200     message_stream = stdout;
00201     ndef_stream = fopen(ndef_output, "wb");
00202     if (!ndef_stream) {
00203       fprintf(stderr, "Could not open file %s.\n", ndef_output);
00204       exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
00205     }
00206   }
00207 
00208   nfc_init(&context);
00209   if (context == NULL) {
00210     ERR("Unable to init libnfc (malloc)\n");
00211     exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
00212   }
00213 
00214   pnd = nfc_open(context, NULL);
00215 
00216   if (pnd == NULL) {
00217     ERR("Unable to open NFC device");
00218     fclose(ndef_stream);
00219     nfc_exit(context);
00220     exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
00221   }
00222 
00223   fprintf(message_stream, "NFC device: %s opened\n", nfc_device_get_name(pnd));
00224 
00225   nfc_modulation nm = {
00226     .nmt = NMT_FELICA,
00227     .nbr = NBR_212,
00228   };
00229 
00230   signal(SIGINT, stop_select);
00231 
00232   nfc_target nt;
00233 
00234   if (nfc_initiator_init(pnd) < 0) {
00235     nfc_perror(pnd, "nfc_initiator_init");
00236     fclose(ndef_stream);
00237     nfc_close(pnd);
00238     nfc_exit(context);
00239     exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
00240   }
00241   fprintf(message_stream, "Place your NFC Forum Tag Type 3 in the field...\n");
00242 
00243   // Polling payload (SENSF_REQ) must be present (see NFC Digital Protol)
00244   const uint8_t *pbtSensfReq = (uint8_t *)"\x00\xff\xff\x01\x00";
00245   if (nfc_initiator_select_passive_target(pnd, nm, pbtSensfReq, 5, &nt) <= 0) {
00246     nfc_perror(pnd, "nfc_initiator_select_passive_target");
00247     fclose(ndef_stream);
00248     nfc_close(pnd);
00249     nfc_exit(context);
00250     exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
00251   }
00252 
00253   // Check if System Code equals 0x12fc
00254   const uint8_t abtNfcForumSysCode[] = { 0x12, 0xfc };
00255   if (0 != memcmp(nt.nti.nfi.abtSysCode, abtNfcForumSysCode, 2)) {
00256     // Retry with special polling
00257     const uint8_t *pbtSensfReqNfcForum = (uint8_t *)"\x00\x12\xfc\x01\x00";
00258     if (nfc_initiator_select_passive_target(pnd, nm, pbtSensfReqNfcForum, 5, &nt) <= 0) {
00259       nfc_perror(pnd, "nfc_initiator_select_passive_target");
00260       fclose(ndef_stream);
00261       nfc_close(pnd);
00262       nfc_exit(context);
00263       exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
00264     }
00265     // Check again if System Code equals 0x12fc
00266     if (0 != memcmp(nt.nti.nfi.abtSysCode, abtNfcForumSysCode, 2)) {
00267       fprintf(stderr, "Tag is not NFC Forum Tag Type 3 compliant.\n");
00268       fclose(ndef_stream);
00269       nfc_close(pnd);
00270       nfc_exit(context);
00271       exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
00272     }
00273   }
00274 
00275   //print_nfc_felica_info(nt.nti.nfi, true);
00276 
00277   if ((nfc_device_set_property_bool(pnd, NP_EASY_FRAMING, false) < 0) || (nfc_device_set_property_bool(pnd, NP_INFINITE_SELECT, false) < 0)) {
00278     nfc_perror(pnd, "nfc_device_set_property_bool");
00279     fclose(ndef_stream);
00280     nfc_close(pnd);
00281     nfc_exit(context);
00282     exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
00283   }
00284 
00285   uint8_t data[1024];
00286   size_t data_len = sizeof(data);
00287 
00288   if (nfc_forum_tag_type3_check(pnd, nt, 0, 1, data, &data_len) <= 0) {
00289     nfc_perror(pnd, "nfc_forum_tag_type3_check");
00290     fclose(ndef_stream);
00291     nfc_close(pnd);
00292     nfc_exit(context);
00293     exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
00294   }
00295 
00296   const int ndef_major_version = (data[0] & 0xf0) >> 4;
00297   const int ndef_minor_version = (data[0] & 0x0f);
00298   fprintf(message_stream, "NDEF Mapping version: %d.%d\n", ndef_major_version, ndef_minor_version);
00299 
00300   const int available_block_count = (data[3] << 8) + data[4];
00301   fprintf(message_stream, "NFC Forum Tag Type 3 capacity: %d bytes\n", available_block_count * 16);
00302 
00303   uint32_t ndef_data_len = (data[11] << 16) + (data[12] << 8) + data[13];
00304   fprintf(message_stream, "NDEF data length: %d bytes\n", ndef_data_len);
00305 
00306   uint16_t ndef_calculated_checksum = 0;
00307   for (size_t n = 0; n < 14; n++)
00308     ndef_calculated_checksum += data[n];
00309 
00310   const uint16_t ndef_checksum = (data[14] << 8) + data[15];
00311   if (ndef_calculated_checksum != ndef_checksum) {
00312     fprintf(stderr, "NDEF CRC does not match with calculated one\n");
00313     fclose(ndef_stream);
00314     nfc_close(pnd);
00315     nfc_exit(context);
00316     exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
00317   }
00318 
00319   if (!ndef_data_len) {
00320     fprintf(stderr, "Empty NFC Forum Tag Type 3\n");
00321     fclose(ndef_stream);
00322     nfc_close(pnd);
00323     nfc_exit(context);
00324     exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
00325   }
00326 
00327   const uint8_t block_max_per_check = data[1];
00328   const uint16_t block_count_to_check = (ndef_data_len / 16) + 1;
00329 
00330   data_len = 0;
00331   for (uint16_t b = 0; b < (block_count_to_check / block_max_per_check); b += block_max_per_check) {
00332     size_t size = sizeof(data) - data_len;
00333     if (!nfc_forum_tag_type3_check(pnd, nt, 1 + b, MIN(block_max_per_check, (block_count_to_check - (b * block_max_per_check))), data + data_len, &size)) {
00334       nfc_perror(pnd, "nfc_forum_tag_type3_check");
00335       fclose(ndef_stream);
00336       nfc_close(pnd);
00337       nfc_exit(context);
00338       exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
00339     }
00340     data_len += size;
00341   }
00342   if (fwrite(data, 1, data_len, ndef_stream) != data_len) {
00343     fprintf(stderr, "Could not write to file.\n");
00344     fclose(ndef_stream);
00345     nfc_close(pnd);
00346     nfc_exit(context);
00347     exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
00348   }
00349 
00350   fclose(ndef_stream);
00351   nfc_close(pnd);
00352   nfc_exit(context);
00353   exit(EXIT_SUCCESS);
00354 }
